publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1346 Sarah Boyack: Draft The Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2000-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft The Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2000 be approved.
